RunnerFactory (autotransform.runner.factory)

A simple factory for producing Runners from type and param information.

class autotransform.runner.factory.RunnerFactory

Bases: object

The factory class for Runners. Maps a type to a Runner.

_map

A mapping from RunnerType to the from_data function of the appropriate Runner.

Type

Dict[RunnerType, Callable[[Mapping[str, Any]], Runner]]

static get(bundle: autotransform.runner.base.RunnerBundle) → autotransform.runner.base.Runner

Simple get method using the _map attribute.

Parameters

bundle (RunnerBundle) – The bundled Runner type and params.

Returns

An instance of the associated Runner.

Return type

Runner
